title: Troglodyte
description: Intelligent, reptilian humanoids with agile hands, long legs, short tails, and spiky combs on their heads and arms.
extras: Hateful: Attempt to kill any creatures they encounter.	Surprise: On a 1–4, due to the ability to change colour to match their surroundings. Lurk by rock walls and await victims.	Nauseating stench: Oils on the skin have a smell that sickens humans and demihumans: save versus poison or suffer –2 to hit, while in melee with troglodytes.
